body: Uh, yes, this needs to be `_u`, not `weight`. I seem to recall that there was a reason to use `copy_`, though. My impression is that this might behave differently across Python versions, in particular Python 3.6 vs. earlier. Is it OK to overwrite a registered buffer with a calculated variable?
